definition: Time series of calibrated accelerometer data, pre-processed to represent external non-gravitational forces and aerodynamic accelerations
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
time,-,Time of observation,1,CDF_EPOCH
acc_aero_obs,m/s/s,Measured Aerodynamic linear acceleration in S/C X-direction,1,CDF_DOUBLE
acc_total_obs,m/s/s,"Calibrated measured linear acceleration in S/C X-direction, with outliers removed",1,CDF_DOUBLE
